description: Task specification describes a full real-estate website but ground truth is a minimal centered text box

specification_requires: sections for featured properties and areas
footer with links to community information and contact forms
evidence.simulated_user_feedback: The ground truth image is a simple, centered text box with a welcome message. It lacks images, multiple sections, and navigation elements.

contradiction: Agent cannot satisfy both written spec (full website) AND match ground truth (minimal text box) - they are fundamentally incompatible designs

parser_issue.affects: HTML submissions rejected before visual evaluation

required_fix.primary: Replace ground truth with a real-estate website design matching the specification
required_fix.secondary: Fix parser to accept HTML for frontend tasks

notes: This is a data quality issue where the ground truth does not match the task specification.
